# controllerUserInteractionEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system delivers game controller input to profile objects or to views using the responder chain.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var controllerUserInteractionEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], when the view controller’s view or its subviews are the first responder, the system delivers the game controller input to the profile objects. If this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the system generates input events and delivers them through the responder chain.
title: controllerUserInteractionEnabled
